item.title: Setting up a WireGuard VPN
item.description: Introduction In this article, I’ll be writing about how I set up a Wireguard VPN on my home server in order to gain access to my home network remotely. We’ll start off with the server-side configuration and move on to the client-side next. Table of Contents Prerequisites Where to find the files Common steps Server-side configuration Client-side configuration Connect the client to the server Sources Prerequisites Obviously, the Wireguard software is required to follow this tutorial.
